item.title: All about that Bard
item.description: So there’s this Brad guy at work right, what a guy, lemme tell you.

item.title: About
item.description: Brad things he’s better than me, but he’s quite wrong.

item.title: Employment

(a Managed Service Provider), Westlake, OH Systems Administrator July 2012 – March 2013 Crestwood Management LLC (a Crestwood Financial LLC subsidiary), Beachwood, OH On-Call Systems Administrator / Server Configuration Expert February 2012 – Present Magic Micro Computers, Inc.
